key_drivers: Falling real yields (-15bps to 2.15%) supporting gold and tech equities
Dovish Fed stance maintaining accommodative conditions for risk assets
USD weakness (DXY 97.63, -0.32%) benefiting commodities and foreign currencies
Credit spreads narrowing (HY OAS 2.97%) signaling healthy risk appetite
Strong semiconductor sector (SOX +5.7%) supporting tech indices
BoJ hawkish pivot and RBA rate hike creating FX divergence opportunities

data_quality.notes: All data sources verified current as of 2026-02-08. FRED data current through Feb 5-6. Real-time market data from TradingView and CNBC.
